title: Waxworks - Das Wachsfigurenkabinett (restored) (1924, German Expressionism, imdb score: 6.6)

sources.title: Waxworks - Das Wachsfigurenkabinett (restored) (1924, German Expressionism, imdb score: 6.6)
sources.description: Waxworks (German: Das Wachsfigurenkabinett) is a 1924 German silent anthology film directed by Paul Leni. The film encompasses several genres, including a fantasy adventure, a historical film, and a horror film through its various episodes. Its stories are linked by a plot thread about a writer (William Dieterle) who accepts a job from a waxworks proprietor to write a series of stories about the exhibits of Caliph of Baghdad (Emil Jannings), Ivan the Terrible (Conrad Veidt) and Jack the Ripper (Werner Krauss) in order to boost business.
